title: Instructional Design for Basketball Tactical Movement Learning Using Video Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing the development of tactical learning methods for pre-service teachers to apply in real classroom settings, highlighting self-directed learning and peer collaboration using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze basketball tactic videos of varying difficulty levels and select appropriate playback speeds (normal/slow).
Learners can design tactical lessons considering learners' cognitive load levels using video modeling techniques.
Learners can develop basketball tactic learning modules applicable to actual classes through project-based assessments.

resources: Basketball Tactics Videos of Various Difficulty Levels

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
